name: POSTER: It Gets Better!
description:
Oooh la la, it's James Darling from when he was in OP's 6th issue, the Schooled issue. Perfect for your dorm room, closet, bathroom, or to frame in the living room!

-Poster is 18" x 24" (there is approx. a 1" white border around the image)
-Photo by Amos Mac
-Matte finish
-Printed on archival, medium high thick poster paper
-Acid free and long lasting

Shipped in super cool brown TUBE!

name: POSTER: Cowboy
description:
Perfect for your dorm room, closet, bathroom, or to frame in the living room!

*** OP / Original Plumbing" logo will appear in the top right corner
*** Poster is 18" x 24" (there is approx. a 1" white border around the image)
*** Photo by Amos Mac
*** First appeared in OP #1, "The Bedroom Issue"
*** Matte finish
*** Printed on archival, medium high thick poster paper
*** Acid free and long lasting

*** Shipped in super cool brown TUBE!

name: Hat: ORIGINAL Snapback New Style Coming Soon!
description:
We will soon release version 6.0 of OP's ORIGINAL snapback!

They wil be unveiled shortly after New Years Day... stay tuned!

name: Original Plumbing: SUBSCRIBE FOR 4 ISSUES!
description:
Get 4 issues of Original Plumbing magazine shipped to your door step before we ship to stores! Your subscription with start off with OP # 12: The Party Issue, or you can choose to have it start with OP # 13: The Atlanta Issue (ship date TBA).

**OP is always shipped in a privacy envelope.

name: Original Plumbing #12: The Party Issue
description:
How does creating space on the dance floor of a dark club transfer to community? When -- if ever -- is the Party over?  Ever wonder what your favorite go-go boys deepest, darkest secrets are?

These topics and sexy spreads of  bartenders, legendary nightlife hosts, go-go boys, ex-nightlife producers, MC's and more are featured in the twelve installment of OP: The Party Issue. 

Featuring: 

Trent Brooks
D'hana Perry
BKLYN BOIHOOD
Murray Hill
Beck Heiberg
OP Cupid with Topher
Mr. Transman
Husbands: Spencer + Kelly
Juliana Huxtable
Exclusive writing by Wu Tsang
Cover model: Berlin Reed/El Ozito

**As always, OP is sent to your home in a plain privacy envelope.

name: Original Plumbing #11: The Hero Issue
description:
OP's 11th ISSUE - Trans Heroes of the Past and Present - Spring 2013

**SPECIAL DOUBLE ISSUE -- THE THICKEST YET***

"You are the beauty that you create." - Lou Sullivan

This 90-page issue of Original Plumbing honors a number of trailblazers who set a precedent for what trans communities are built upon as well as those who continue to create change today. Including a special section celebrating the life of Lou Sullivan, we showcase the FTM International newsletter he launched in 1986 by featuring a spread of their earliest covers through the years, republished for the first time since its initial printing.

Featuring:
Lou Sullivan
Kylar Broadus
Kate Bornstein
Del LaGrace Volcano
Jamison Green
Imani Henry
Gunner Scott
Christopher Lee
Janet Mock
Tyler Fong
Jed Bell
Rupert Raj

Contributions By:
Dean Spade
Sean Dorsey
Catherine Opie
Stephen Ira
Alexander Rose
James Darling
Shawna Virago
Oliver Bendorf
Josh Klipp
Jason Cromwell

Special thanks to the San Francisco GLBT Historical Society and Female-To-Male International.

**As always, OP is sent to your home in a plain privacy envelope.

name: Original Plumbing #10: The Jock Issue
description:
OP's 10th ISSUE -- The Jock Issue.

With pieces by:

T Cooper
Keelin Godsey
Josh Klipp
Cooper Lee Bombardier
Nico Amador & Jacsen Callanan
Ray Ray

Featured Players:

Basketballer Kye Allums
Triathlete Chris Mosier
Body Builder Lee
Rugby Player Ali
P.E. Teacher Jesse

+ Major League Poster Tear-Outs!
+ Free Jock Photo Sticker by Amos Mac for Visual AIDS!

As always, OP is sent to your home in a plain privacy envelope.

name: Translady Fanzine with Zackary Drucker
description:
FIne art photographic periodical published by Amos Mac, featuring text by artist, trans woman and human being Zackary Drucker. All images created in collaboration by Mac and Drucker, shot in Syracuse, NY over a snowed in Christmas holiday.

Large format (19.5″ x 13.37″ when opened)

Printed in full color.

Final copies remain!

Translady Fanzine will be shipped in a large privacy envelope to your home.

name: Original Plumbing #9: The Entertainment Issue
description:
This is our largest issue EVER, featuring filmmakers, musicians, comics and artists from the trans male community.

Featuring:

SCHMEKEL
ATHENS BOYS CHOIR
WU TSANG
SILAS HOWARD
RAE SPOON
LUCAS SILVEIRA
GEO WYETH
IAN HARVIE
BLACK CRACKER
JOSHUA BASTIAN COLE
And cover guy WYATT RIOT from tv’s “Put It In Your Mouth With Wyatt Riot”

Exclusive pieces from:

JOSHUA KLIPP
CHASE JOYNT
HENRY GIARDINA
OLIVER BENDORF
EMERSON WHITNEY

**OP is always shipped in a privacy envelope for your convenience.

name: Original Plumbing #8: The Family Issue
description:
This issue isn't just for OP fans, but is also a personal resource for family members of trans children and trans parents looking for community. Some subjects touched on include: Chosen family, solo parenting (& dating) as trans men, being a supportive parent of a transgender teenager in the public school system, foster parenting, grieving the loss of a family member, trans male pregnancy and more.

Photo spreads and interviews with: 

-THOMAS BEATIE: Beyond "The Pregnant Man"
-16 pages of portraits and interviews from the 10th annual PHILADELPHIA TRANS-HEALTH CONFERENCE
-WYATT & MAX: Two trans guy dads dish on solo parenting and the dating strike that lasted a year
-KY: NYC welder & cover model talks about the adoption process from personal experience
-YOUR MOM: OP Editors Amos Mac & Rocco Kayiatos shut up and give their mothers the floor

WITH EXCLUSIVE WORDS BY: 
-Nick Krieger
-Sawyer DeVuyst
-Elliot Foxprince
-Nick Mwaluko
-Charlie Stephens
-Carole Alfe & Diana Kayiatos (The Moms of OP)

**OP is always shipped in a privacy envelope for your convenience.

name: Original Plumbing #7: The Green Issue
description:
SUPER EXTRA SPECIAL ENVIRONMENTAL EDITION WITH PAPER SO GREEN IT'S ACTUALLY GREEN!

Photo spreads and interviews with: 
-Sensitive beefcake DANNY BEE
-BERLIN REED the Ethical Butcher
-DAMIEN BYERS on a rural small town transition
-Queer porn star PUCK GOODFELLOW
-Singer, Performer and true dendrophile JUSTIN VIVIAN BOND

WITH WORDS BY: 
-James Darling
-Tom Léger
-Jonah Bones
-Tuck Mayo
-Jake Sylvertris
-Ryan Keogh
-Rocco Kayiatos
-Amos Mac

**OP is always shipped in a privacy envelope for your convenience.

name: Original Plumbing #6: Schooled
description:
**Final Available Copies**

Conversations about education, school daze and a sexy school boy photo spread featuring archetypes The Nerd, The Jock (Billy Castro), The Band Geek (James Darling), The Stoner, The Metal-Head, The Teachers Pet and The Heart Throb.

Photo spreads and interviews with:

-Toronto baking student DENTO
-Teacher and comedian CAYES
-High school hero BENJI
-Artist spotlight with TWIZ RIMER

Featuring written words by:
-Berlin Reed
-Chris Vargas
-Wyatt Austin
-Wesly Heney
-James Douglas

**OP is always shipped in a privacy envelope for your convenience.

name: Original Plumbing #5: Fashion
description:
Conversations around personal style and fashion alike; featuring interview spreads with high fashion menswear designer of SIR NY, Auston Bjorkman & San Francisco fashion staple, designer, and owner of The Seventh Heart, Jess Cueves.

Style Profiles: Ten trans guys talk to us about their personal fashion

The Dandies of Philadelphia: A photographic exploration

Exclusive writing from:

-Alastair Brant
-e-j Scott
-Berlin Reed
-Glenn Marla

name: Original Plumbing #4: Workin' Stiff
description:
Originally released in Summer 2010, Issue 4 features trans men speaking candidly about careers:

Activist RUBIN
Stunt-man SAWYER
Baker SIMONE
London Drag Queen ADRIAN X
Writer and Painter RED JORDAN 
Businessman SETH
Trans Partners TINA + JUNIOR

Featuring articles by Dylan McGinty, Tristan Donovan, Matteo Montone, David Latour and Joshua Riverdale (of Transguys.com)

name: Original Plumbing #3: Health & Safer Sex Issue
description:
The Health & Safer Sex issue features articles on holistic transition approaches, yoga, fitness, steamy locker room truths and surgery shares.

Photo features and interviews:
Back to Basics with LUKE WOODWARD
NIKO gives us a "Tour de Sex Club"
Healing Hands of SAUL
Artist Spotlight SAM LOPES 
Backstage with KIT YAN
and LOLZographer JULIE BLAIR

Features articles by:
Jacoby Ballard
Chase Ryan Joynt
Tobi Haberstroh
Dori Midnight
a/b
Ace Morgan
Cooper Lee Bombardier

*As always, OP will be sent to your home in a privacy envelope!

name: Sweatshirt: STEALTH
description:
Original Plumbing introduces their first sweatshirt into the mix. 

This limited edition STEALTH sweatshirt is exactly what is says it is.

Sexy, soft, and seriously secretive. Silkscreened with love just for you!

Ssshhh...You don't have to be stealth to throw on this beauty. 

Model: Darrelle

-Gildan brand, Heavy Blend 
-Preshrunk
-Black sweatshirt with black text silkscreened
-50% Cotton / 50% Polyester

name: TANK: MUSCLE BOY
description: Nothing screams "I enjoy summer heat and I know how to have fun and I swear I am smiling on the inside even if I am not smiling on the outside" more than a swishy-haired vintage muscle boy in a tank top, ON a tank top. Perfect if you're a summer show-off or year-round just cuz, this tank top was designed by Austin-based artist Xavier Schipani exclusively for Original Plumbing. This is our first round of artist tanks. OP will continue to commission artists from our community to design limited edition clothing and accessories. Extremely limited edition. Model: Mars (Read our interview with artist Xavier Schipani here!)

name: STEALTH T-shirt
description:
The STEALTH T has arrived!

Like it's big brother counterpart the STEALTH Sweatshirt, you don't have to be stealth to throw on this handsome article of clothing. 

-Limited edition
-Black TulTex brand t-shirt 
-Pre-shrunk
-Super soft (like, really really soft)
-Silkscreened with love by Queer Kuntry (Atlanta, Ga)

name: "NOBODY KNOWS I'M A TRANSSEXUAL" Sticker
description: 8.5" x 2.75” -- Order one for $2 / five for $6 / ten for $10! Save some cash if you buy in bulk.

name: TANK: ORIGINAL 2013
description:
Our OP summer 2013 tank tops are now available online! Don't you love things like words and letters? We just LOVE words and letters, especially when stacked on top of each other and then printed onto a tank top. This tank is perfect for whimsical bike rides, loitering, reading in tall grass, gym sessions, laying in bed all day, protests, dancing, crying, rollerblading, and ESPECIALLY selfies (#originalplumbing on instagram so we can see)!

-This tank top reads "ORIGINAL PLUMBING"
-Black tank top, white text
-Gildan Ultra Cotton
-100% Cotton
-Pre-shrunk

Sizing note: Model is 5'3" and is wearing a size MEDIUM.

name: TANK: ORIGINAL 2013 WHITE
description:
We had this version of the OP summer 2013 tank top previously available at events only, but now we are offering the few remaining to you. Blow out, because it's FALL, and as always we like to make room for the next season! 

This tank is perfect for whimsical bike rides, loitering, reading in tall grass, gym sessions, laying in bed all day, protests, dancing, crying, rollerblading, and ESPECIALLY selfies (#originalplumbing on instagram so we can see)!

-This tank top reads "ORIGINAL PLUMBING"
-White tank top, black text
-Gildan Ultra Cotton
-100% Cotton
-Pre-shrunk

Sizing note: Model is 5'3" and is wearing a size MEDIUM.
